name: Sync All Resume Data (Manual)
description: Manually synchronize all resume data with React components and generate PDF

actions.prompt:
Please perform a complete resume synchronization:

1. **Update Experience Data**: Run `node scripts/update-experience-component.js` to sync professional experience
2. **Update Skills Data**: Run `node scripts/update-skills-component.js` to sync technical skills
3. **Update Hero Content**: Run `node scripts/update-hero-content.js` to sync years of experience, project counts, and bio text
4. **Generate PDF**: Run `npm run resume:build` to create updated PDF resume
5. **Type Check**: Run `npm run type-check` to ensure all components compile correctly
6. **Verify Changes**: Check that all components were updated successfully
7. **Summary**: Provide a detailed summary of all changes made

This comprehensive sync ensures the website (including hero section), components, and PDF resume are all in perfect sync with the markdown source.
